metadata.name: The Bathhouse
metadata.description: As a follow up to the open edition “AutoBlooms” collection, this is my genesis 1/1 artificial intelligence art collection. “Bloomin Bandos” is a continued exploration of the beauty in decay versus the colourful, liveliness of the flower world. It features different types of abandoned buildings, being taken over by beautiful canopies of different coloured flowers. The collection is largely inspired by the places and things I have seen during my travels, mixed with the whimsical, colourful delights of my imagination. I hope you enjoy!
